feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
